title: "Meet the 7 startups Mayo Clinic just welcomed to its AI accelerator"
excerpt: "Mayo Clinic recently welcomed seven more healthcare startups to its accelerator program. In exchange for an equity position in each startup, Mayo Clinic gives young digital health companies the opportunity to refine their AI models using its deidentified data sets and subject matter experts."
